llm_command:
kubectl apply -n cartservice -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: allow-frontend-checkout-to-cartservice
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  ingress:
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: frontend
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: checkoutservice
    ports:
    - port: 7070
      protocol: TCP
EOF
output: error: resource(s) were provided, but no name was specified
